column1: Tedder Hedgerow is a Bree-hobbits from Bree in The Lord of the Rings: War in the North. He is a adept player of the Riddle-game
column2: being the best of Bree. He can be found in the Prancing Pony
column3: and challenges the player with a riddle
column4: in reward of money.The Lord of the Rings: War in the North
